Welcome to Chef Tour, a travel service that offers an unparalleled experience of Europe’s hidden gems.

About Chefs Tour

Founded in 2005 by travel enthusiasts Chef Romain Bapst and Mr Martin O'Dee, our boutique tours offer an unparalleled experience of Europe's hidden gems. With a maximum of 8 guests per tour, we ensure personalised service and exclusive access to unique culinary and cultural experiences. Romain, an acclaimed executive chef, crafts bespoke itineraries, while Martin's expertise in wine and spirits enriches each journey.

Explore Europe's culture, cuisine, and wines with our expert travel planners and guides, dedicated to creating unforgettable memories.

READ MORE
